attributes.action: Cheaper travel for students 16+ in full time education
attributes.additional_details: Having to rely on public transportation can become expensive for anybody, especially students in full time education that have to rely on using it daily. Yes there is minimal help out there in the form of railcards, but these have to be purchased to only perhaps reduce the cost of your journey, there is no guarantee. Prices should be cut or students should be helped financially when it comes to travel.
